name: DOSball
description:
This is the first game I ever made (I was 11 years old). Written in Pascal, which was my first programming language. It's here only because I found the original 16-bit executable and it turned out I was already pretty FLOSS-oriented, cause I happened to attach source code to everything. At least, source code of a unit (Pascal name for library or module), not of the main program. Still, the main program was pretty easy to reconstruct.

This is only here to prove that I don't know Pascal and that I can make games.

The source code is available on my Github. If you look carefully enough, you can see I had implemented a simple cheat code back then.
